title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.6（水域更新 第三阶段）发布
author: AzureZeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AZWorld 于 2018-8-29 23:25 编辑 
Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内的 使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft 统一版本。正式版是 Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商城也会推送次更新。New Features:
新特性: 
Phantom mobs will now spawn in the night skies if a player hasn't slept in over three in-game days. (Please note that there is a bug currently where phantoms may not swoop down- we will be fixing this bug as soon as we can!)
如果一个玩家在 3 天内没有睡觉，幻翼会在夜空中生成(请注意现在仍然有 bug 可能会导致幻翼不会飞下来 - 我们正在尽可能快的修复这个 bug)Barrier Blocks
屏障
Great for map makers to limit players and mobs to certain areas of the world
对于地图制作者来说，这是个把玩家和生物限制在指定区域的好东西Can be placed in Creative mode and are invisible in Survival and Adventure modes
在创造模式中可以被放置，在生存和冒险模式中不可见Can only be obtained using commands and do not appear in the Creative inventory
屏障没有加入到创造模式物品栏，仅允许通过命令获得

Changes:
改动:
Menu and inventory tabs can now be navigated using the [ and ] keys (Can be remapped in Settings)
菜单和物品栏选项卡现在可以使用 [ 和 ] 键来切换（可以在设置中重新设置）Pages can now be turned in the Book & Quill using the controller bumper buttons
(书的)页面现在可以使用手柄的保险杠按钮进行翻页。Personal Game Mode is now set to the Default Game Mode option when first joining a world
当加入一个世界/存档时，个人游戏模式将被设定为世界/存档的默认游戏模式Added the 'doinsomnia' game rule to toggle Phantom spawning when commands are enabled
[版本独有]加入 doinsomnia 游戏规则，用于调整幻翼是否会生成Added fresh new icons to game invite and achievement notifications on Nintendo Switch
[Nintendo Switch]在游戏邀请和成就提示的 UI 中加入了新的图标Adjusted mouse input sensitivity for slower turning at lower values
调整了鼠标的灵敏度，使得在设置成较低值下转动的更慢

Fixes:
修复:
修复了 86 个漏洞
Crashes/Performance
崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay
修复游戏过程中发生的一些崩溃Fixed a crash that occurred when using Pick Block in a spot where a mob just died
修复了当生物刚死亡时使用选取方块键发生的崩溃Fixed a crash that occurred when players were spawning and the spawn point was getting set every tick
修复了当玩家重生，并且重生点每一刻都被设定时发生的崩溃Fixed a crash that occurred when joining a game and downloading Greek Mythology textures
修复了加入游戏并下载希腊神话材质包时发生的崩溃Increased performance for menu load times
提高加载时菜单耗时性能


General
常规
Fixed the "Ahoy” and "Atlantis" achievements not unlocking on Nintendo Switch
[Nintedo Switch] 修复了无法获得成就"啊嘿！"和成就"亚特兰蒂斯？"的问题Fixed an issue that caused touch screen actions to repeat after touch release
修复了当轻触释放后重复触屏行为的问题Fixed controls becoming unresponsive after resuming the game from standby (MCPE-22195)
修复待机后进入游戏无法操作(MCPE-22195)Operator permissions are now granted to players when the host creates a world with Trust Player Permissions set to Operator
当创建一个信任玩家权限为操作员的世界时，将给予操作员权限Fixed the upload failure that occurred when exporting to Remix3D
修复了当导出到 Remix3D 时发生的上传错误


Gameplay
游戏体验
Firework Rockets once again give the proper boost when using Elytra (MCPE-30821)
MCPE-30821 - 在使用鞘翅时烟花火箭再次适当地加速Crouching on ladders will no longer stop when opening the pause menu or inventory screen
当潜行在梯子上打开暂停菜单或物品栏屏幕时，会继续潜行Fixed the speed boost given by Dolphins being too slow when wearing armor with Depth Strider
修复当穿有深海探索者的靴子时海豚给予的加速效果过慢的问题The Resistance effect will now protect against the Wither effect (MCPE-21515)
MCPE-21515 - 抗性提升效果现在将抵抗凋零效果Players no longer clip through blocks and suffocate while swimming (MCPE-34112)
玩家在游泳时不再卡方块和窒息(MCPE-34112)Players are now able to return to the Overworld if an End Portal is on their spawn point (96153)
玩家如果出生点在末地传送门上现在能够返回主世界了


Items
物品
Buckets now stack properly when getting ejected from crafting output
当从合成输出中弹出时，桶可以正确堆叠了Fixed an exploit that allowed players to obtain a 'Water' item (MCPE-28883)
修复了一个文件可以获得水物品的漏洞(MCPE-28883)Fixed an exploit that allowed items to be duplicated using the Recipe Book (MCPE-36167)
修复了允许通过配方书复制物品的漏洞(MCPE-36167)


Mobs
生物
Guardians no longer attack fish (125705)
守卫者不再攻击鱼(实体)Fixed Guardians spawning even when Mob Spawning is disabled (MCPE-34027)
MCPE-34027 - 修复即使在禁用生物生成下守卫者仍然生成的问题Fixed issues with the Ender Dragon disappearing or dying for little to no reason
修复了末影龙无故消失或死亡的问题Drowned now have a much easier time attacking players that are swimming above them
溺尸现在更容易攻击那些在他们上面游泳的玩家Fixed Strays and Skeletons having trouble leaving the water to attack players
修复流浪者和骷髅难离开水去攻击玩家的问题Wolves no longer get stuck attacking Skeletons that are underwater
狼不再困在水下攻击骷髅Fixed a bug where Parrots could ride Donkeys and Mules (MCPE-25737)
修复了鹦鹉可以骑乘驴和骡的问题(MCPE-25737)Blazes now attack Snow Golems (MCPE-13191)
MCPE-13191 - 烈焰人现在将攻击雪傀儡Elder Guardians now drop Wet Sponges when killed
远古守卫者被杀死后会掉落湿海绵Fixed monster spawners appearing empty on converted Console Edition worlds
修复了主机板转换存档后，刷怪箱出现空白的问题Hostile mobs in boats can no longer attack from every angle (MCPE-16938)
船上敌对的生物不再能从各个角度进攻(MCPE-16938)Dolphins can no longer attack players through solid blocks
海豚不再能通过实心方块攻击玩家Baby Horses, Donkeys and Mules can no longer be pushed through solid blocks (MCPE-20114)
马的幼体，驴，骡不再能穿过固体方块(MCPE-20114)Creepers no longer remain white or quickly flash when killed
爬行者在被杀死时不再显示白色或快速闪光Entities following a target entity will now navigate properly over slabs
跟踪目标实体的实体现在将正确地在台阶(半砖)上进行导航Used chests can now be equipped to Mules and Llamas (MCPE-32152)
MCPE-32152 - 使用的箱子现在可以装备给骡子和羊驼


Blocks
方块
Underwater plants can now be placed in water columns that originate from the top water source blocks
水下植物现在可以被放置于从顶部水源方块制造出的的水柱上Kelp now mimics Seagrass in its placement and can be placed on most blocks underwater (MCPE-33747)
MCPE-33747 - 海带现在可以像海草一样放置，可以放置在大部分水下Kelp that is planted by players will now grow over time
玩家种植的海带会随着时间而增长Chemistry blocks in a world uploaded to a Realm are no longer corrupted
上传到 Realm 的存档中的化学方块不再被损坏Observers will now detect changes with Droppers, Dispensers, Brewing Stands, Farmland, Saplings, Sugar Cane, Fire, and Grass blocks
侦测器现在可以侦查到投掷器、发射器、酿造台、耕地、树苗、甘蔗、火和草方块的变化The amount of fuel in Brewing Stands now converts from Console Edition worlds (MCPE-34677)
在主机版转换世界后酿造台能量不会消失（MCPE-34677）Activating an End Portal will now replace any blocks inside the portal (MCPE-28344)
MCPE-28344 - 激活末地传送门将取代传送内部的所有方块Fixed certain variants of Rails having an incorrect hitbox size
修正了某些铁轨的错误碰撞箱大小Land plants can no longer be placed underwater (MCPE-34124)
陆地植物不能再水下放置(MCPE-34124)Command Blocks now correctly conduct Redstone power (MCPE-33021)
MCPE-33021 - 命令方块现在会正确的引导红石电流Fixed an issue that allowed rails to be duplicated (MCPE-18230)
修复了铁轨重复的问题(MCPE-18230)Fixed the Cactus hitbox being displayed too low
修复仙人掌碰撞箱过小的问题


Realms
领域服(Realms)(基岩版)
The owner of a Realm, once again, no longer counts towards the player limit of a Realm
Realm 的主人不再计入 Realm 玩家限制Improved error messaging when attempting to join a Realm via invite link with an outdated version of the game
改进了当尝试通过带有过期版本的游戏的 Realm 邀请链接加入时的错误信息


World Generation
世界生成
Fixed floating Rails that generated in abandoned mineshafts (MCPE-23189)
废弃矿洞中不再生成浮空的铁轨(MCPE-23189)


Graphical
图形
Improved the Trident throwing animation
改进三叉戟的投掷动画Visibility now increases over time when submerged in flowing water
当潜入水中时能见度会随着时间的推移而增加Cocoa Beans now display correctly when using HD Resource Packs (MCPE-30552)
当使用高清材质包时可可豆将会正常显示(MCPE-30552)Field of View can once again be adjusted when the "FOV Can Be Altered by Gameplay" option is disabled (MCPE-32403)
MCPE-32403 - 视场(FOV)再次调整时，"FOV可以通过游戏调整"选项被禁用Redstone dust now renders on the sides of Glass blocks (MCPE-21542)
MCPE-21542 - 红石粉现在呈现在玻璃块的侧面Resource packs once again apply when joining a multiplayer game that has a pack enabled (MCPE-33770)
当多人游戏有资源包启用时资源包再次应用(MCPE-33770)Fixed Texture Packs having a placeholder icon on the Pack Validation screen on Android devices
材质包在 Android 设备的包验证屏幕上占位符图标不会消失The Ender Dragon is no longer missing the texture on its neck when playing the Norse Mythology Mash-up Pack (MCPE-33966)
在挪威神话主题包中，末影龙脖子上的材质不会消失Food particles no longer gradually change position after swimming and will always come out of the player's mouth area (MCPE-33984)
MCPE-33984 - 食物的颗粒在游泳之后不再逐渐变换位置，总是从玩家嘴的位置出来Fixed a rare case of Ender Chests from Console Edition worlds converting to normal Chests with Ender particles (MCPE-26717)
修复了在罕见的情况下，主机板在转换存档时把末影箱转换为带末影粒子的普通箱子(MCPE-26717)Leads no longer flicker when playing in split-screen multiplayer
当分屏进行多人游戏时游戏不再闪烁Particles from Enchanted Arrows no longer drift in flowing water
从附魔箭飘出的粒子在流动的水中不再漂移Water Bottle icons no longer have red liquid on Android devices. It wasn't creepy or anything (MCPE-34167)
[Android]水瓶图标不再有红色液体。那不是让人害怕的任何东西(MCPE-34167)Players no longer appear to be floating above Minecarts (MCPE-33787)
玩家不再矿车上浮空了(MCPE-33787)Swimming through certain waterlogged blocks no longer removes underwater fog (MCPE-33917)
游过特定的带水方块不再移除水下迷雾(MCPE-33917)Oculus Rift mirror screen view now displays properly on monitors with 4K resolution
[Oculus Rift]镜像屏幕在 4K 显示器上显示正常


Audio
声音
Lowered the volume of the 'punching air' and 'punching mobs' sound effects
降低了'punching air'和'punching mobs'的声音大小Fixed the sounds of items breaking twice for Boats, Minecarts, Paintings, and Armor Stands
修复了船，矿车，画，盔甲架破坏时响起两次声音的问题


User Interface
用户界面(UI)
Items can once again be crafted from the Recipe Book while the Craftable filter is disabled and the player only has enough materials to craft a single recipe
当合成过滤器被禁用，并且玩家有足够多的材料合成一次时，物品可以再次通过合成书合成Quickly moving a stack of items in the inventory with a controller no longer leaves items behind (MCPE-34694)
使用控制器快速移动物品栏中的一组物品时不再会遗漏物品(MCPE-34694)Fixed the Cancel button not appearing on Windows 10 devices when joining a cross-platform world
[Windows 10]修复了当加入跨平台世界时取消按钮消失的问题Opening Book & Quill on touch devices no longer causes blocks to break (MCPE-29752)
MCPE-29752 - 在触屏设备上打开书和羽毛笔不再导致摧毁方块The gamepad cursor can now be used to navigate Villager trades (MCPE-33330)
游戏手柄光标可以正确指向村民交易(MCPE-33330)Multiple items can now be collected from the Villager trading output slot (MCPE-32635)
MCPE-32635 - 现在可以从村民交易输出槽中收集多个物品Fixed overlapping issues with the Dragon Head equipped on the inventory screen
修复了在物品栏界面装备龙首时的重叠问题The Crafting Table's output field hover state now matches the field's size
工作台的输出区域悬停时现在可以正确匹配区域大小Quick moving items from the hotbar to a container now works as intended (MCPE-19952)
MCPE-19952 - 从热键栏到容器快速移动物品的行为现在正常了Hitting the Enter key in the inventory no longer moves the cursor in/out of the text field or grabs/drops items
在物品栏中按下回车键(Enter)不再将光标移入/移出文本字段或选取/丢弃物品Selecting the output of an uncraftable recipe no longer causes the output item to disappear
使用无法合成配方时的输出不再导致输出项消失了Fixed inconsistent behavior when Attack/Destroy is mapped to Right-Click on the mouse (MCPE-23383)
修复攻击/破坏被应用在鼠标右键时行为不一致(MCPE-23383)Levers now have a "Use" controller hint
拉杆在控制器提示上现在有"使用"提示文本


Commands
指令
Using '/fill doors' now fills the chosen area with doors instead of air blocks
现在使用 /fill doors 指令将会在指定区域填充门方块(而不是空气方块)Using the '/setblock' command on Redstone components will now properly update and power the mechanism (MCPE-21218)
MCPE-21218 - 使用/setblock命令在红石成分上现在会正确地更新和驱动Cloning containers no longer removes their custom names
复制容器时不再删除它们的自定义名称Slabs with 'can_place_on' tags can once again be placed by players in Adventure mode
带有“can_place_on”标签的台阶可以再次在冒险模式中被玩家放置


Add-Ons:
附加件:
Updated templates for 1.6.0 with new assets and behaviors can be downloaded from minecraft.net/addons
现在已经可以在 minecraft.net/addons 下载到更新了新的资源包和行为包的 1.6.0 版本模板Fixed several issues with Fish textures that pertained to Resource Packs
修复了属于资源包的鱼材质的一些问题'minecraft:behavior.player_ride_tamed' will now override all other AI goals
'minecraft:behavior.player_ride_tamed'将会覆盖其它任何的AI目标'movement.sway' once again allows mobs to move properly
'movement.sway'再次可以允许生物准确移动
